scripts.live: ls *.js | entr fish -c 'browserifyinc full.js -t babelify --outfile dist/full.js; and echo "done!"'
scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserifyinc full.js -t babelify --outfile dist/full.js && cp background.js dist/
scripts.pack: rm -fr tmp/ && npm run build && mkdirp tmp && cp -r dist tmp/ && cp icon128.png icon64.png icon48.png icon16.png manifest.json tmp/ && zip -r archive.zip package.zip tmp/*
